payload.description:
As a developer, I want to add local virtual project mappings in a gitignored .kanbus.override.yml file so that I can view issues from other local repositories on my board without committing those paths to the shared repository configuration.

The override file's virtual_projects entries are merged additively with those in .kanbus.yml so both sets of projects are available.
payload.title: story Add .kanbus.override.yml support for local virtual project mappings
